revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR710N |revision=(US) v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/18/2013 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR710N |ic_id=8853A-WR710N |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=F16-100HP |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S28D40FTP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''150Mbps Wireless N Mini Pocket Router - Advanced Edition''
[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR710N Product page] "2050500329" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=32888 On the OpenWrt forums] :[http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/693/img5624bn.jpg Image of the board front] :[http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/2110/img5623j.jpg Image of the board back] Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual and sample label. :Additionally, the FCC sample label shows a MAC w/ an OUI of B0:48:7A. It may be used.
